content: Analysis: Bangladeshs BNP seeks Hasinas liberal mantle before elections The split between the BNP and the Jamaat-e-Islami could dramatically reshape Bangladeshs political landscape. The split between the BNP and the Jamaat-e-Islami could dramatically reshape Bangladeshs political landscape. Indian officials say they are examining Dhakas latest request, made after Hasina was sentenced to death in absentia. The new transparency feature on Elon Musks social media platform has raised concern among users. Nine of the top 10 mega-cities are in Asia, with Bangladeshs Dhaka projected to be the worlds largest city by 2050. Dhaka says New Delhi has an obligatory responsibility to hand over the former leader, recently sentenced to death. Fridays earthquake was felt in the capital Dhaka and neighbouring districts, causing destruction and panic. A magnitude 5.7 earthquake struck central Bangladesh, killing at least nine people and injuring more than 300. At least five people killed in deadly earthquake close to the capital city Dhaka on Friday. Dozens more injured as buildings in the capital swayed in the earthquake, sending panicked residents into streets. The interim government should aim to reform the democratic institutions to break with the politics of vendetta. As hundreds of families who lost loved ones in 2024 protests welcome verdict, many wonder if Hasina will face justice.
title: Bangladesh | Bangladesh | Today's latest from Al Jazeera
